law.catch_line: A municipal corporation in Prince George--amp--rsquo;s County that is in the regional district may n...
law.text: A municipal corporation in Prince George--amp--rsquo;s County that is in the regional district may not exercise any powers relating to planning, subdivision control, or zoning not granted to the municipal corporation by the district council under --amp--sect; 25--amp--ndash;303 of this article.
